name: Iconest - Ceccotti Collezioni
description: Iconest echoes the softly sinuous lines of the Icosof√† in a round sofa of sculptural forms. The frames in solid American walnut support the circular upholstered seat and the slim elongated backrest covered in fabric or leather in a choice of colours from the available palette. Iconest, with its original shell-like shape, offers a refuge in which to enjoy a moment's relaxation in public or private spaces.
